title: 5 Ways to Use the Yahoo Search Engine

steps.title: Go to https://search.yahoo.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://search.yahoo.com/ in a web browser. You can use any web browser (like Chrome or Firefox) to search with Yahoo.

steps.title: Enter search terms into the "Search" box that is related to the content and data you want to find.
steps.content: Enter search terms into the "Search" box that is related to the content and data you want to find. Be specific as possible when entering keywords. This can help narrow down your search results and provide you with the exact information you are looking for. For example, if you want to learn about dog grooming methods for a poodle, enter "best methods for grooming a poodle" instead of a basic phrase such as "dog grooming." [1] X Research source Reader Poll: We asked 506 wikiHow readers, and 62% of them agreed that the best way to seek out information is by using search engines like Yahoo. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Click to begin your search.
steps.content: Click to begin your search. Alternatively, press the Return/Enter key on your keyboard. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Review your search results.
steps.content: Review your search results. Yahoo will provide you with a list of relevant websites and articles that match the keywords you entered into the search box. You'll also see a list of related questions that result in similar keywords, like "Do Poodles make good hunting dogs?" Click the question to read more. Click on the "Next" button at the bottom of any Yahoo search results page to see more websites and links that match your search criteria. You can also click the terms or phrases under "Searches related to…" to find more results that are similar to your search.

steps.title: Go to https://search.yahoo.com//web/advanced in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://search.yahoo.com//web/advanced in a web browser. You can use any web browser to perform an advanced search on Yahoo. There isn't an easy way to get to the advanced search, so using the direct link is best.

steps.title: Enter keyword preferences next to "Show results with."
steps.content: Enter keyword preferences next to "Show results with." You can choose to have Yahoo display search results that match your keyword phrase exactly or have results displayed that omit a specific keyword.

steps.title: Choose a domain type next to "Site or Domain."
steps.content: Choose a domain type next to "Site or Domain." For example, if you just want search results displayed for government websites, you can select "Only .gov domains" from the options provided. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Specify a file type next to "File Format."
steps.content: Specify a file type next to "File Format." This option can be helpful if you are looking for specific types of documents. For example, if you are looking for search results in the form of a presentation, select "Microsoft PowerPoint" from the list provided. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Specify your adult content preferences.
steps.content: Specify your adult content preferences. You can choose to filter out search results that contain adult content next to the field labeled "SafeSearch Filter."

steps.title: Specify country and language.
steps.content: Specify country and language. You can choose whether you want Yahoo to display search results for websites that originate in another country and whether you want to see results for websites written in a particular language using the "Country" and "Languages" fields.

steps.title: Click Yahoo Search.
steps.content: Click Yahoo Search . The keywords and advanced filters you created will apply to the search, and your results will match your advanced search requirements.

steps.title: Filter your search results by time.
steps.content: Filter your search results by time. You can refine your search results to see content based on when it was published on the web. [5] X Research source Navigate to the toolbar above your search results, then indicate whether you want to see results from the past day, past week, or past month by clicking the "Anytime" drop-down and selecting the new option.

steps.title: Filter search results by category.
steps.content: Filter search results by category. This can be helpful if you are searching for content within a specific category. For example, if you want to watch videos about "blogging tips," you can choose just to have results displayed for videos that feature blogging tips. [6] X Research source Click on any of the category tabs displayed above your search results to refine your search. Your options will include images, videos, news, and more.

steps.title: Use Yahoo's suggestions for different keywords.
steps.content: Use Yahoo's suggestions for different keywords. At the top and bottom of your Yahoo search results pages, you will see suggested keyword combinations next to "Searches related to …," which can help display results that are more relevant to the content you seek. [7] X Research source Click on any of the keyword combinations provided to display new search results based on those specific keywords.

steps.title: Click the grid icon on any Yahoo search page.
steps.content: Click the grid icon on any Yahoo search page. It's on the right side of your browser next to the purple "Yahoo" logo.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . You'll see this at the bottom of the menu next to an icon of a gear.

steps.title: Click Preferences.
steps.content: Click Preferences . You'll see this in the pane on the left side of the page. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Specify your "SafeSearch" preference.
steps.content: Specify your "SafeSearch" preference. SafeSearch allows you to specify whether you want to see adult content, images, or videos displayed in your search results at any time. [9] X Research source Use the drop-down menu to make your choices.

steps.title: Indicate your "SearchScan" preferences.
steps.content: Indicate your "SearchScan" preferences. SearchScan allows you to indicate whether you want Yahoo to alert you of potentially malicious websites that display in your search results. [10] X Research source Use the drop-down menu to change this.

steps.title: Set where you want search results to open and how many should be listed on a page.
steps.content: Set where you want search results to open and how many should be listed on a page. You can set the search results, when you click them, to open in the current tab or a new tab. You can also set Yahoo to display 10-100 results per page.

steps.title: Click Languages.
steps.content: Click Languages . It's in the menu on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Specify your language preference.
steps.content: Specify your language preference. You can choose to have Yahoo display search results in one or more specific languages or in display them in any language.

steps.title: Click Search History.
steps.content: Click Search History . Find this in the panel on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Delete search history you don't want, click Turn History Off, or Clear History.
steps.content: Delete search history you don't want, click Turn History Off , or Clear History . If you don't like your search history, you can remove single items or clear the entire list. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . To save your Yahoo search preferences.

steps.title: Use specific and detailed keyword search terms.
steps.content: Use specific and detailed keyword search terms. This practice will provide you with the most relevant results in your search. For example, if you want to learn about waxing techniques for your car, enter "automobile waxing techniques" instead of "waxing techniques," which can display results for body waxing or candle wax. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Place the plus and minus symbols in front of words you want to be included or excluded from your search results.
steps.content: Place the plus and minus symbols in front of words you want to be included or excluded from your search results. For example, if you want search results displayed for book reviews on the biography genre specifically, enter "+biography book reviews." [13] X Research source

steps.title: Place quotation marks around specific phrases you want Yahoo to find on various websites.
steps.content: Place quotation marks around specific phrases you want Yahoo to find on various websites. For example, if you want to find websites or articles that contain the phrase "quid pro quo," be sure to include quotation marks around that particular phrase in your search.

steps.title: Perform a search on multiple topics using "OR" in capital letters.
steps.content: Perform a search on multiple topics using "OR" in capital letters. For example, if you want to search for websites or articles that display the latest hockey or football sports scores, enter "game scores football OR hockey."
